item.title: Trump pushes trade, defence ties with B'desh as he congratulates new PM Rahman. [ economictimes ]
item.description:
[Priority]

Systemic Significance

Selected by: Gemini-2.5-Flash-Lite, Mistral-Small, Qwen-3-32B, GPT-OSS-120B

US President Donald Trump urged Bangladesh's new Prime Minister Tarique Rahman to strengthen trade and defense ties, calling for decisive action on defense pacts. Trump highlighted a recent reciprocal trade agreement benefiting farmers and workers in both nations. The deal includes reduced tariffs for Bangladesh and increased imports of US goods and military equipment.

item.title: Indian visas in Bangladesh likely to be 'fully restored' soon as Rahman takes charge. [ timesofindia ]
item.description:
[Priority]

Systemic Significance

Selected by: Gemini-2.5-Flash-Lite, Mistral-Small, Qwen-3-32B, GPT-OSS-120B

India is set to "fully restore" its visa services in Bangladesh. This comes after a recent change in Bangladesh's political leadership. Aniruddha Das, a senior Indian consular official, confirmed the steps to fully restore services. Medical and double-entry visas are already being issued. Other categories, including travel visas, will also resume soon. This move signals a strengthening of India-Bangladesh relations.
